fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Modify a player's organs at night, permanently applying one of the following effects to them:
> - Brain: Converted to Neutral Evil with the goal "Live to see the Town lose."
> - Heart: Dealt an Unstoppable attack
> - Lungs: Roleblocked
> - Stomach: Short circuited
> - Skin: Defense set to Vulnerable
> - Genitals: Unable to use abilities that would add new players to the game

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only choose each organ twice, except Brain, which you may only choose once.
